indicator.title: Output Indicator
indicator.description: Notification rate of new smear positive TB cases Treatement success rate Number of TB cases among refugees registered and reported to the national health authority in the past year Number of ambulatory TB cases previously hospitalized that receieved food support

baseline.comment: 155 cases notified of new smear positive TB 80% treatement success rate 13 TB cases registered among refugees 0 ambulatory TB cases previously hospitalized that receieved food support

target.comment: 163% notification rate of new smear positive TB cases 85% Treatment success rate 36 reported TB cases among refugees registered and reported to the national health authority in the past year 1312 ambulatory TB cases previously hospitalized that received food support

actual.comment: 85% Treatment success rate 5 reported TB cases among refugees registered and reported to the national health authority in the past year 500 ambulatory TB cases previously hospitalized that received food support

target.comment: 85% Treatment success rate 36 reported TB cases among refugees registered and reported to the national health authority in the past year 1312 ambulatory TB cases previously hospitalized that received food support
